snippet: After weeks fighting in court to keep the source of its funds secret, the Arizona nonprofit group that had made an anonymous $11 million donation to two California ballot measure campaigns revealed the source of the money Monday. Sort of.
abstract: After weeks fighting in court to keep the source of its funds secret, the Arizona nonprofit group that had made an anonymous $11 million donation to two California ballot measure campaigns revealed the source of the money Monday. Sort of.

headline.main: Arizona Group Says It Was Middleman for Donations to California Ballot Measures
